column9: Reviewed in the United States on August 23, 2020
column14: I get so upset when they discontinue my favorite color lipstick.  And it ALWAYS happens.  This "spoiled fabulous" color works better on me than any other lipstick I have found.  And again, Discontinued! So glad for Amazon.  I didn't think about Amazon when they discontinued it.  But then I thought, I'll just try.  And sure enough; Amazon had it. Love the lippstick.
